hooks.command: FILE_PATH=$(echo '$TOOL_INPUT' | jq -r '.file_path'); if [[ "$FILE_PATH" =~ \.(ts|js|tsx|jsx)$ ]]; then npx biome check --fix --unsafe "$FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null || true; fi
FILE_PATH=$(echo '$TOOL_INPUT' | jq -r '.file_path'); if [[ "$FILE_PATH" =~ \.(ts|js|tsx|jsx)$ ]]; then npx biome format --write "$FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null || true; fi
